title: Why are there organized crime gangs such as La Cosa Nostra or the Mexican Mafia, Yakuza, Triad, etc. and what do they gain from it? - Quora
tags: Yakuza (organized crime syndicates originating in Japan)

response.answer_text: Troy Mason’s answer is correct. These organizations grew into what they are today because of the power gain thru violence, the money their illegal activities bring in, and the influence in the communities and politics.
Short answer- They orginated from a collected need to survive within each and every one of their communites. They gain power, money and influence with their communites in return.
